version_description:
▸ New star players & team jerseys!
▸ Bug fixes & optimizations.
As always, thank you all for your support and feedback!
You are beyond awesome! <3

▸ New star players & team jerseys!
▸ Bug fixes & optimizations.
As always, thank you all for your support and feedback!
You are beyond awesome! <3

▸ New star players & team jerseys!
▸ Bug fixes & optimizations.
As always, thank you all for your support and feedback!
You are beyond awesome! <3

▸ New star players & team jerseys!
▸ 2 new club countries: Hungary + Bosnia and Herzegovina!
▸ Bug fixes & optimizations.
As always, thank you all for your support and feedback!
You are beyond awesome! <3

▸ New star players & team jerseys!
▸ 2 new club countries: Hungary + Bosnia and Herzegovina!
▸ Bug fixes & optimizations.
As always, thank you all for your support and feedback!
You are beyond awesome! <3

This update contains EPIC STUFF! We heard your feedback and also addressed some issues:

Gameplay
+ Participate in Leagues and aim for the top
+ Play exciting matches with your team
+ Customize your team kit (including short and socks)

Content
+ Missing top teams added: Benfica, Everton, Feyenoord
+ New countries for your clubs: Colombia, South Africa, Uruguay, Vietnam

Bug fixes
+ The currency unit display system was not working as intended and has been fixed
(don't worry, you'll keep all your cash! Nothing really important changes but high level currency units (aa, ab etc.) are now displayed properly)
+ Other minor improvements & fixes

Thank you again for all your feedback and suggestions, you're way beyond awesome!! <3

Bug fixes

(don't worry, you'll keep all your cash! Nothing really important changes but high level currency units (aa, ab etc.) are now displayed properly)
+ Other minor improvements & fixes

Thank you again for all your feedback and suggestions, you're way beyond awesome!! <3

This update contains EPIC STUFF! We heard your feedback and also addressed some issues:

Gameplay
+ Participate in Leagues and aim for the top
+ Play exciting matches with your team
+ Customize your team kit (including short and socks)

Content
+ Missing top teams added: Benfica, Everton, Feyenoord
+ New countries for your clubs: Colombia, South Africa, Uruguay, Vietnam

Bug fixes
+ The currency unit display system was not working as intended and has been fixed
(don't worry, you'll keep all your cash! Nothing really important changes but high level currency units (aa, ab etc.) are now displayed properly)
+ Other minor improvements & fixes

Thank you again for all your feedback and suggestions, you're way beyond awesome!! <3

We heard your feedback and also addressed some issues:

+ The VIP Pack is now a permanent upgrade
+ 100+ new cities
+ Bug fixes (including the currency unit display)

Thank you again for all your feedback and suggestions, you're way beyond awesome <3
And stay tuned, world-class features are coming!!!

We heard your feedback and also addressed some issues:

+ Benefit from permanent "Epic Upgrades" (both business and football) and make your clubs even more awesome
+ Upgrade your favorite players (instead of replacing them)
+ Receive free Gold Bars everyday
+ 100 new cities
+ Bug fixes & optimizations

Thank you for all your feedback and suggestions, you're way beyond awesome <3
And stay tuned, world-class features are coming!
